title: Your weather update for Monday (18)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Meteorology announced that showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Sabaragamuwa, Central, Uva, Northern, North-central, Eastern, and North-western provinces during the evening or night.
Showers may occur in the Western province and Galle, Matara, and Puttalam districts during the morning.
The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
